adjective.description: Designating or relating to something situated over a deck or on a deck over something else.

verb.description: (Chiefly in pass.). To deck or adorn (a person or thing) to excess. Chiefly with with.

origin: Late 19th century. From over- + deck. Compare earlier overdeck and under-deck<br>early 16th century (in an earlier sense). From over- + deck.
